text: 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships was a ski race. Skiers raced in Sestriere, Italy. They started racing on January 14, 2011. They stopped racing on January 23, 2011. There were Downhill, Giant Slalom, Slalom, Super-G, Super Combined and Team races. 1 8 6 4 18 2 7 4 4 15 3 5 4 2 11 4 4 3 0 7 5 3 2 3 8 6 3 2 0 5 7 1 0 0 1 8 0 3 2 5 8 0 3 2 5 10 0 1 5 6 11 0 1 4 5 12 0 1 3 4 13 0 1 1 2 14 0 0 1 1 0 0 0 0 Total 31 31 31 93 ==References== Category:2011 in sports Category:Piedmont Category:Alpine skiing Category:2011 in Europe Category:2010s in Italian sport
title: 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships
